thread.title: Divyanka Tripathi Looks Rather Different & Hot In These Photos
thread.title_full: Divyanka Tripathi Looks Rather Different & Hot In These Photos

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Divyanka Tripathi Looks Rather Different & Hot In These Photos
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 27 . 2017 Divyanka Tripathi, Aditi Bhatia in Ye Hai Mohabbatein 
Divyanka Tripathi is mostly seen in a desi avatar as her onscreen character Ishita, in Ye Hai Mohabbatein. The woman rocks the saris she sports in the show and looks quite graceful while she is at it – no wonder she is one of the most popular TV actresses! 
Recently, for the launch party of her co-star Anita Hassanandani and her husband Rohit Reddy ‘s business venture, The Bag Talk, Divyanka stepped out looking rather different from her usual self. And she looked quite sexy, TBH! Check out a few photos: A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:33am PST A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 24, 2017 at 10:32am PST A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 24, 2017 at 10:53am PST A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 24, 2017 at 11:07am PST A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 24, 2017 at 11:17am PST A post shared by Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya (@divyankatripathidahiya) on Feb 26, 2017 at 5:14am PST 
Quite a departure from her regular desi diva style, right? We are loving this change, what about you guys? 0
